text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: ValueSet lab-orderCodes-eu-lab

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Order, where the codes are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Both, where the codes are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips

Dutch

Gegenereerde narrative: ValueSet lab-orderCodes-eu-lab

Deze waardelijst includeert codes gebaseerd op de volgende regels:

  • Inclusie codes uithttp://loinc.org waar ORDER_OBS = Order. waar de codes staan in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips
  • Inclusie codes uithttp://loinc.org waar ORDER_OBS = Both. waar de codes staan in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips

name: LabOrderCodesEuVs
title: Laboratory Order
description: List of LOINC Laboratory codes of type 'Order' or 'Both. This value set is built upon the IPS value set 'Results Laboratory Observation - IPS'
